name: Her name was E
description:
If you plan on rating this for GDKO, please note that the jam scoring criteria is to compare to the original, so please play the original first if you haven't already.

This is a remake of E from GDKO Round 3. It is a submission to the GDKO Final. E was on the top performers list of Round 3 (#1 in theme, #2 in story, #3 overall out of 39). If you haven't played E yet, it is recommended to play it first by clicking here. The remake makes many references to the original.

  • Contains a short excerpt of "Haunted" by Ross Bugden (Creative Commons 4.0). All other music and sounds are public domain from pixabay.com or freesound.org, then mixed and edited together by me. I also used some public domain 2D photos/textures from unsplash.com.
  • All other art, graphics, environments and assets were made by me for this game jam.
  • Browser: I recommend using Chrome (or Brave). You can also use Firefox but I noticed that sometimes the audio becomes a bit desynchronized.

If you like, you can see all my other GDKO games about E in this collection. For example, this final entry includes a few references to my Round 6 entry (the final was originally going to be scored by the GDKO judges and they had previously played it.)
